content.rendered:
IEEE International Symposium on Smart Electronic Systems (iSES) 2023, Sponsorship Information

(http://www.ieee-ises.org/2023)

Sponsorship of an international conference represents an organization’s innovations, developments, and capabilities of the world of eminent scientists and engineers who are from academia and industry. The opportunities of IEEE International Symposium on Smart Electronic Systems (iSES) sponsorship are available on a first-come, first-serve basis. So, organizations are advised to reserve the opportunity that spotlights the organization’s name. The following table gives a summary of benefits that possibly an organization can get at iSES..

SponsorshipSponsorship Sponsorship Privileges from iSES
CategoriesFees (US $)
1)The sponsor's name would be displayed synonymously with iSES.
2)Appropriately sized logo on the side panels of the backdrop on
stage(s), along with other applicable logos.
3)Logo on the conference badge, along with the conference logo
4)Logo on the conference bag, along with the conference logo
Silicon6,0005)Logo on sponsors’ choice item FCFS, from: Conference mug, pen,
water bottle, visiting Card Holder
6)Registration fee will be waived off for upto 10 delegates from the
sponsor.
7)Coverage in print media as per conference's publicity plan that gets to
be in place.
1)The sponsor would be considered as an associate sponsor and its
name would be displayed on every poster of iSES.
Platinum4,0002)
3)		Appropriately sized logo on the side panels of the backdrop on
stage(s), along with other applicable logos
Coverage in print media as per conference's publicity plan that gets to
be in place.
4)Registration fee will be waived off for upto 6 delegates from the
sponsor.
1)The sponsor would be a co-sponsor and its name would be displayed
on very poster of the iSES.
Gold3,0002)
3)		Appropriately sized logo on the side panels of the backdrop on
stage(s), along with other applicable logos.
Coverage in print media as per conference’s publicity plan that gets to
be in place.
4)Registration fee will be waived off for upto 4 delegates from the
sponsor.
1)Appropriately sized logo on the side panels of the backdrop on
stage(s), along with other applicable logos.
Silver2,0002)Coverage in print media as per conference's publicity plan that gets to
be in place.
3)Registration fee will be waived off for upto 3 delegates from the
sponsor.
1)Appropriately sized logo on the side panels of the backdrop on
stage(s), along with other applicable logos.
Bronze1,0002)Coverage in print media as per conference's publicity plan that gets to
be in place.
3)Registration fee will be waived off for upto 2 delegates from the
sponsor.

NOTE:

  • In addition to the above, other negotiable sponsorship is possible on case-to-case basis. Please contact General Chairs and Finance Chairs using the contact information available in the website. The objective is to encourage maximum participation and get maximum support from community of scholars.
  • In case of common item of interest, higher sponsorship package sponsors will be given the first preference, if applicable. 
  • Logos to be provided by the sponsor as per conference’s specifications; All content for display material, banners, backdrops, advertisements, to be put up as part of sponsorships collaterals, will have to be supplied by the sponsors, in the formats required, within the timelines specified. 
  • The payments may be in US $ or Indian National Rupee (INR). With sponsors taking care of and responsible for ensuring prevailing conversion rates – from whatever currency into Indian rupees, on the day of remittance.
